overview_of_class: This class explores textual analysis in relation to screen studies.  We examine the development of ideas about texts, textuality, and analysis in the context of Euro-American?especially French?cine-semiotics in the 1970s; the methodological self-consciousness of early textual analysis; and the limits and possibilities of an "anti-interpretive" analytic position.  We also consider the vicissitudes of textual analysis in relation to questions of media history, theory, ideology, and reception.  Some of the guiding questions for the class:  What was textual analysis?  What is it (or could it be) now?  What is the object of analysis in textual analysis?  How do you do things with texts?
name: Textual Analysis
subject: RTVF
